title: Design and Validation of Social Studies Education Programs Based on Multiple Intelligence Theory

context.additional_context: Social education program for general citizens aged 40+ conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze diverse social issues with over 80% accuracy through educational design based on multiple intelligence theory.
Learners enhance critical thinking about social phenomena by utilizing interactive content provided in mobile microlearning environments.
Learners diagnose their dominant intelligences with 90% reliability via multiple intelligence-specific assessment tools and apply them to solving social issues.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
